ModMetaData.name: Jelano retexture - RPG Style Inventory
ModMetaData.author: Jelano
ModMetaData.description:
The Jelano retexture series aims to improve textures both from the original game and from community mods.
This mod retextures the UI from the popular "RPG style inventory" mod by Sandy. I made every element from the interface more aesthetic.
I would appreciate your support on Patreon. Have a good day
